entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:37 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:37 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
